author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Heritage Financial to buy Premier Commercial for about $88.6 mln
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Heritage Financial Corp:
* ORATION TO ACQUIRE PREMIER COMMERCIAL BANCORP * ‍HERITAGE WILL ACQUIRE PREMIER IN AN ALL-STOCK TRANSACTION VALUED AT APPROXIMATELY $88.6 MILLION, OR $15.12 PER SHARE​
* PREMIER SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE 0.4863 SHARES OF HERITAGE COMMON STOCK FOR EACH SHARE OF PREMIER COMMON STOCK
* ‍UPON CONSUMMATION, SHAREHOLDERS OF PREMIER WILL OWN APPROXIMATELY 7.7% OF COMBINED COMPANY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
